wikipedia_page.main: Air Commodore Anthony Norman Davis,  (14 August 1918 – 1988) was a Royal Air Force officer who served as a pilot during the Second World War.

response: * Anthony Norman Davis (1918–1988), British Royal Air Force officer
He is the grandson of Air Commodore Anthony Norman Davis (14 August 1918 – 1988) a British Royal Air Force officer who served as a pilot during the Second World War.
